metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing Mermaid - NOTE Please rename to Saer Deelia.After Foundry destroyed, civilians come to deactivated SW.One of civilians dialogs
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-159.871567;25.131435;-84.656570&camTarget=-160.507172;24.460075;-85.037743ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for npc to appear and talk to this particular npc.

0.speaker: Saer Deelia
0.text: That wrecked Steel Watcher - ugh! It smells like something died in it!

1.speaker: Saer Deelia
1.text: This used to be a good neighbourhood, without all this unseemly squabbling.
